thread.title: Mexico cenbank report flags inflation, growth, energy price risks

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Mexico cenbank report flags inflation, growth, energy price risks
text:
MEXICO CITY, Feb 28 (Reuters) - The balance of risks to growth remains on a downward bias, while the balance of risks to inflation remains upwardly slanted in an environment of high uncertainty, Mexicoâ€™s central bank said on Wednesday in its quarterly report.
The Banco de Mexico also said in the report that future risks to inflation could come from significant price rises in some energy products. (Reporting by Mexico City newsroom)
